physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It is rectangular and it features a group of military personnel. All of them are males except for a female, who is sitting at the front row, second from the left. There is a also a boy and a man who is not wearing a military uniform. They are standing in the last row. There are three rows of people in total, and only the people in the front row are sitting down. The background of the photograph shows the entrance of a building, with its door, window, and columns.
title_text: Group of Military Personnel Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: group portraits military personnel children (people by age group)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portrait photography Portraits, Group Soldiers Boys
